plot: Kim Seo-bang raises his two sons as best he can but the elder son is rebellious, lazy and disrespectful so Kim disowns him. The younger son is devoted to his father and tries to reunite his family
title: Kim Seo-bang
plot_es: Kim Seo-bang raises his two sons as best he can but the elder son is rebellious, lazy and disrespectful so Kim disowns him. The younger son is devoted to his father and tries to reunite his family
plot_en: Kim Seo-bang raises his two sons as best he can but the elder son is rebellious, lazy and disrespectful so Kim disowns him. The younger son is devoted to his father and tries to reunite his family
